Rowdy Wolf:






Rowdy Wolf was surprised to hear that the wolf talked. His bright yellow 
eyes went wide and he gasped. He thought it was just another lone wolf that 
passed by his territory once it a while. They were usually no threat.
But this one talked! Really talked!
He mustered his head and called out, "Who...who are you?"
